response.job_title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Engineer | Typescript | Python | Go | Node | React | Fiber | FastAPI | Software Architecture

profile_positions.description: I work as a full stack engineer in the fintech project of the company. I contribute to improving processes such as billing, payroll management and monetary services such as wallets and payment methods management. I also help to maintain or update integrations with apis such as plaid, stripe and unit.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Engineer

profile_positions.description: Worked as a full stack developer on a customer relationship management system used by small and medium-sized banks. I developed a software solution from scratch with a team of 3 people, we used React on the client side and Node.js on the server side implementing microservices architecture and deploying everything on google cloud.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Developer

company.name: Apiux Tecnología
company.description: We are a Cloud-Native technology partner that helps companies in all industries in Latam, Spain, US to migrate or take full advantage of digital technology with flexible, data-driven solutions built in the cloud. We are in Chile, Colombia, Peru, Spain, and the United States.
